summary: Simple Mountain Retexture intended to use with ONE MOUNTAIN - To Rule Them All (by Gamwich)
descriptionHtml:
[color=orange]Simple Mountain Retexture intended to blend with other textures from the world and ground.[/color]

[size=4][color=#4682b4][b]About this mod:[/b][/color][/size]
[color=#c0c0c0]This mod will change the texture of your mountains and rocks. It was created having performance in mind, a texture that blends well with the world and other ground textures without putting strains on your system. They are 2k quality, compressed and I don't intend to make a higher resolution unless I have a reasonable amount of requests.[/color]

[size=4][color=#4682b4][b]Requirements:[/b][/color][/size]
[color=#c0c0c0]- Official Skyrim 1.9.32.0 or higher.
[/color]

[size=4][color=#4682b4][b]Only Textures Inside, no ESP.[/b][/color][/size]

----------------------------------------------------------------

[size=4][color=#4682b4][b]Compatibilities:[/b][/color][/size]
[color=rgb(192,192,192)]Vanilla meshes and improved UV meshes have been tested with no issues so far.[/color]

[size=4][color=orange][b]Incompatibilities:[/b][/color][/size]
[color=#c0c0c0]Nothing I can tell.[/color]

[size=4][color=#4682b4][b]Recommended mods:[/b][/color][/size]
[color=#c0c0c0]Bethesda HighRes Texture Packs
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58666/?][u][color=#0066cc]ONE MOUNTAIN - To Rule Them All[/color][/u][/url][color=#c0c0c0] by Gamwich.
or
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2906/?]Better Rocks and Mountains - UV Tweak[/url] by Four Leaf Clover.
[/color][/color]

[size=4][color=#4682b4][b]Credits and Thanks:[/b][/color][/size]
[color=#c0c0c0][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3476923/?]Gweneal[/url] for her reliant betatesting.
Bethesda for the amazing Game.
Nexus for the network community and support.[/color]
author: Xannon98
